name: delegate_research
description: Delegate research prompts to another research agent to gather additional information on each prompt. Call this if you need more detailed information to construct your research response.

prompts.description: A list of up to three research prompts to delegate to separate research agents for more information.

example1.summary: Requesting recent updates on CRISPR technology developments.

prompts: Investigate the most recent advances in CRISPR technology for gene editing in 2023.

example2.summary: Inquiring about the latest research on mRNA vaccine safety.

prompts: Gather the latest data on the efficacy and safety of mRNA vaccines in development stages in 2023.

example3.summary: Seeking information on new EU digital privacy regulations.

prompts: Compile a summary of newly implemented regulations in the EU affecting digital privacy in 2023 onwards.
